titleStmt.title: A briefe and true relation of the murther of Mr. Thomas Scott preacher of Gods word and Batchelor of Diuinitie. Committed by Iohn Lambert souldier of the garrison of Vtricke, the 18. of Iune. 1626. With his examination, confession, and execution.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by M. Flesher] for Nath. Butter,

notesStmt.note: Title page and page 10 marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
